2024_1213: Configure SSL for AIC
+++++

1) We had an extra character in the "certhash" value and netsh complained with the following error message = "The parameter is incorrect".  This is interpreted as our certhash parameter is incorrect.

+++++
Your security team may flag accessing your AIC based upon the certificate that you have now even though it supports secure SSL access.
Can you try to contact your IT department (and/or security team?) to request a proper certificate from your internal certificate authority?

We were able to secure access to AIC in my lab and remediate the "Not Secure" message but we were able to create our own certificate to match our FQDN.
+++++

Following this email, you will receive an automated confirmation that the case is closed, along with the ability to re-open the case if any related errors return. In addition, you will also receive a separate email with a survey where you can let us know how we did. Feel free to leave any feedback via the survey link!
